attributes.action: Cancel Mileage Limits for NHS Community Staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If staff travel over 3500 pa miles as standard users or 9000 pa as regular users the amount paid per mile is reduced by half. With increases in tax and fuel costs this is not sustainable for staff working in rural areas in the community who are enabling patients to stay in their own homes.
